name: Just a Dream (itch) (Arctic)
description:
After a long day, you go up to your bedroom and decide to go to bed, but when you fall asleep you find yourself stuck in your dream, on top of a skyscraper. ..

Walk to the bed to enter the dream!

Follow the arrow to get started.

Please keep in mind:

This is the first ever game I have built and published, I have one in the workings but that isn't out yet.

I had 3 days to make this game so please leave constructive criticism but don't be too harsh!
